scenes.description: Mel finishes explaining the rules of the hopscotch game.
Amelia designates Mel to go first. Mel takes her first turn but the ball goes out.
Amelia's first turn. She scores 10 points and successfully completes the hopscotch.
Mel's second turn. She scores 8 points and completes the hopscotch.
Amelia's second turn. She scores 7 points and completes the hopscotch.
Mel's third turn. She scores 7 points and completes the hopscotch.
Amelia's third turn. The ball goes out, resulting in a fail.
Mel's fourth turn. She scores 7 points and completes the hopscotch.
Amelia's fourth turn. The ball goes out, resulting in another fail.
Mel's fifth turn. The ball goes out.

subtitles.original: ことだ。イエーイ！
subtitles.english: That's it. Yay!

subtitles.original: そして、合計点数が多い方が勝ち！
subtitles.english: And, the one with the higher total score wins!

subtitles.original: ケンケンパを失敗したり、特定の升からボールがはみ出したりしたら失敗！
subtitles.english: If you fail the hopscotch or if the ball goes out of the specific square, it's a fail!

subtitles.original: はい。点数は加算されない、ということだね！
subtitles.english: Yes. Points won't be added, that's what it is!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！落ち着け！イエーイ！よしよしよし
subtitles.english: Yay! Calm down! Yay! Good, good, good.

subtitles.original: So because Mel is my senpai, Mel gets the first turn. イエーイ！
subtitles.english: So because Mel is my senpai, Mel gets the first turn. Yay!

subtitles.original: よし！しょうがないな。
subtitles.english: Alright! Can't be helped then.

subtitles.original: ジーニアス・ヴァンパイアの力を見せてやろう。
subtitles.english: Let me show you the power of a genius vampire.

subtitles.original: Let's see, let's see.
subtitles.english: Let's see, let's see.

subtitles.original: では、第一球。行きます！なー！
subtitles.english: Now, the first ball. Here I go! Naa!

subtitles.original: Go! Ah, ah, ah!
subtitles.english: Go! Ah, ah, ah!

subtitles.original: マジか。マジか。
subtitles.english: For real? For real?

subtitles.original: So the rules are if you get it out, it goes to the next person's turn. So I guess it's my turn.
subtitles.english: So the rules are if you get it out, it goes to the next person's turn. So I guess it's my turn.

subtitles.original: アメリア。へへへ。アメリア。ネクスト。オッケー。
subtitles.english: Amelia. Hehehe. Amelia. Next. Okay.

subtitles.original: So Ame next.
subtitles.english: So Ame next.

subtitles.original: 頑張れゲーマー、レッツゴー。
subtitles.english: Good luck gamer, let's go.

subtitles.original: Doo! Oh, oh!
subtitles.english: Doo! Oh, oh!

subtitles.original: うそでしょ！お、お、おお！
subtitles.english: No way! Oh, oh, oh!

subtitles.original: 10 points! Okay.
subtitles.english: 10 points! Okay.

subtitles.original: Now let's see the real test.
subtitles.english: Now let's see the real test.

subtitles.original: No switching feet.
subtitles.english: No switching feet.

subtitles.original: Okay. ケン、ケン、パ。ケン、ケン、パ。ケン、ケン。
subtitles.english: Okay. Hop, hop, jump. Hop, hop, jump. Hop, hop.

subtitles.original: おー、これをゲット。おー、怖い！おー！
subtitles.english: Oh, catch this. Oh, scary! Oh!

subtitles.original: オッケー、あと帰るだけだよ。
subtitles.english: Okay, now you just have to come back.

subtitles.original: ケン、ケン、パ。ケン、ケン、パ。ケン、ケン、パ。
subtitles.english: Hop, hop, jump. Hop, hop, jump. Hop, hop, jump.

subtitles.original: イエーイ！First point for Ame.
subtitles.english: Yay! First point for Ame.

subtitles.original: Great! Okay, Mel, your turn.
subtitles.english: Great! Okay, Mel, your turn.

subtitles.original: うわー、狙うは 10 points! 頑張って。
subtitles.english: Whoa, aiming for 10 points! Do your best.

subtitles.original: 頑張って。うわー！
subtitles.english: Good luck. Whoa!

subtitles.original: Oh, nice! Eight! Eight points!
subtitles.english: Oh, nice! Eight! Eight points!

subtitles.original: よし、いきます！ケン、ケン、パ。
subtitles.english: Alright, here I go! Hop, hop, jump.

subtitles.original: ケン、ケン、パ。ケン、パ。ん！
subtitles.english: Hop, hop, jump. Hop, jump. Hm!

subtitles.original: Oh nice, やるじゃん！Jump over it.
subtitles.english: Oh nice, not bad! Jump over it.

subtitles.original: ん！うぉー、よっ！からの、これを拾って。
subtitles.english: Hm! Whoa, yo! And then, pick this up.

subtitles.original: Nice, nice. ん、ケン、パ。
subtitles.english: Nice, nice. Hm, hop, jump.

subtitles.original: ケン、ケン、ゴー！ナイス！よっしゃー！
subtitles.english: Hop, hop, go! Nice! All right!

subtitles.original: Oh, good job. Good job. Okay, Ame turn number two.
subtitles.english: Oh, good job. Good job. Okay, Ame turn number two.

subtitles.original: Doo! Whoa, seven points! Seven.
subtitles.english: Doo! Whoa, seven points! Seven.

subtitles.original: Seven. Okay. ヒ、ケン、ケン、パ。
subtitles.english: Seven. Okay. Hi, hop, hop, jump.

subtitles.original: ケン、ケン、パ。ケン、ケン、拾って。
subtitles.english: Hop, hop, jump. Hop, hop, pick it up.

subtitles.original: ん、しょ、よっ。
subtitles.english: Hm, sho, yo.

subtitles.original: ケン、ケン、パ、ゴー！オッケー、ナイス。
subtitles.english: Hop, hop, jump, go! Okay, nice.

subtitles.original: Nice. Mel turn number three.
subtitles.english: Nice. Mel turn number three.

subtitles.original: 負けられない。ふん、ふん。
subtitles.english: Can't lose. Hm, hm.

subtitles.original: Bowling. あ、お、お、やったー！
subtitles.english: Bowling. Ah, oh, oh, I did it!

subtitles.original: Nice. Okay, seven points. Seven. いきまーす。
subtitles.english: Nice. Okay, seven points. Seven. Here I go.

subtitles.original: ケン、ケン、パ. ケン、ケン。
subtitles.english: Hop, hop, jump. Hop, hop.

subtitles.original: ん！お、お、お、ベー。
subtitles.english: Hm! Oh, oh, oh, bee.

subtitles.original: Nice. ケン、パ。ケン、ケン。
subtitles.english: Nice. Hop, jump. Hop, hop.

subtitles.original: ゴー！ナイス、ゴール！
subtitles.english: Go! Nice, goal!

subtitles.original: どや！どや！Good job. Good job.
subtitles.english: How's that! How's that! Good job. Good job.

subtitles.original: Okay, Ame next. Okay, no problem. Gah!
subtitles.english: Okay, Ame next. Okay, no problem. Gah!

subtitles.original: お、お、お、アウトー！
subtitles.english: Oh, oh, oh, out!

subtitles.original: あれ？お、アウト、アウト、アウト、しーっ、マン。
subtitles.english: Huh? Oh, out, out, out, shh, man.

subtitles.original: It think it's out. It's like on the line, right on the line. What do you guys think? Chat, you guys said out.
subtitles.english: It think it's out. It's like on the line, right on the line. What do you guys think? Chat, you guys said out.

subtitles.original: Chat says out. チャットがアウトだって。
subtitles.english: Chat says out. Chat says out.

subtitles.original: どっちだ？あれ？おや？あ、絶対にアウト。アウト。
subtitles.english: Which is it? Huh? Oh? Ah, definitely out. Out.

subtitles.original: アウト、アウト、アウト、イエーイ、オッケー。
subtitles.english: Out, out, out, yay, okay.

subtitles.original: Mel's turn. Number four. 難しいね。
subtitles.english: Mel's turn. Number four. It's difficult, isn't it.

subtitles.original: You guys are supposed to be on my side, chat, come on. テン、テン、テンポイント。
subtitles.english: You guys are supposed to be on my side, chat, come on. Ten, ten, ten points.

subtitles.original: ゴー、ゴー！うー、なっ！
subtitles.english: Go, go! Woo, na!

subtitles.original: オッケー、ナイス、セブン！セブン！
subtitles.english: Okay, nice, seven! Seven!

subtitles.original: Lucky seven.
subtitles.english: Lucky seven.

subtitles.original: ケン、ケン、パ。ケン、ケン。
subtitles.english: Hop, hop, jump. Hop, hop.

subtitles.original: 拾って、ん、ケン、パ。
subtitles.english: Pick it up, hm, hop, jump.

subtitles.original: ケン、ケン、よっしゃー！
subtitles.english: Hop, hop, all right!

subtitles.original: Oh, nice! やった！Mel, so cute, so cute. Okay.
subtitles.english: Oh, nice! I did it! Mel, so cute, so cute. Okay.

subtitles.original: Ame turn number four. おー、きゅう！
subtitles.english: Ame turn number four. Oh, nine!

subtitles.original: きゅう！お、お、お、え、アウト！？
subtitles.english: Nine! Oh, oh, oh, eh, out!?

subtitles.original: しーっ！おかしい！
subtitles.english: Shh! That's strange!

subtitles.original: Maybe I'll get a 10 on the next one. Is anybody keep... chat, are you guys keeping track of the points?
subtitles.english: Maybe I'll get a 10 on the next one. Is anybody keep... chat, are you guys keeping track of the points?

subtitles.original: しーっ！これはアウト。
subtitles.english: Shh! This is out.

subtitles.original: アウト、アウト、アウト。
subtitles.english: Out, out, out.

subtitles.original: Referee, okay. Mel's turn.
subtitles.english: Referee, okay. Mel's turn.

subtitles.original: Mel, turn number five.
subtitles.english: Mel, turn number five.

subtitles.original: いきます、頑張って。うー、なー！
subtitles.english: Here I go, do your best. Woo, naa!

subtitles.original: お、お、お、アウト。
subtitles.english: Oh, oh, oh, out.
